I am Paz😇, a Healthcare bot.
I am here to help you navigate around our interface. eg. 

 Registration (if you are a new patient) 
 Return of an existing patient

For resgistration you need to provied:

   🧍Username _(it's not neccesarily your real name)_

   📧Email (it should be a valid one where we can comunicate with you incase of anything)

   🔑Password (it should contain at least 8 characters including number,uppercase and lowercase letters)

For log in, 
You need to use the 📧Email and 🔑Password used during your registration.

Incase you do not remember the password, you can click the Forgotten password button and you will receive a link on your email.
